# Code quality rules overview

> Documentation for Code quality rules overview.

*Topics available: 336*

- [CA1000: Do not declare static members on generic types (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1000.md): Learn about code analysis rule CA1000: Do not declare static members on generic types
- [CA1001: Types that own disposable fields should be disposable (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1001.md): Learn about code analysis rule CA1001: Types that own disposable fields should be disposable

- [CA1815: Override equals and operator equals on value types (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1815.md): Learn about code analysis rule CA1815: Override equals and operator equals on value types

- [CA1827: Do not use Count/LongCount when Any can be used (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1827.md): Learn about code analysis rule CA1827: Do not use Count/LongCount when Any can be used

- [CA1830: Prefer strongly-typed Append and Insert method overloads on StringBuilder (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1830.md): Learn about code analysis rule CA1830: Prefer strongly-typed Append and Insert method overloads on StringBuilder

- [CA1835: Prefer the memory-based overloads of ReadAsync/WriteAsync methods in stream-based classes (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1835.md): Learn about code analysis rule CA1835: Prefer the memory-based overloads of ReadAsync/WriteAsync methods in stream-based classes

- [CA1837: Use 'Environment.ProcessId' instead of 'Process.GetCurrentProcess().Id' (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1837.md): Learn about code analysis rule CA1837: Use 'Environment.ProcessId' instead of 'Process.GetCurrentProcess().Id'

- [CA1839: Use 'Environment.ProcessPath'](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1839.md): 'Environment.ProcessPath' is simpler and faster than 'Process.GetCurrentProcess().MainModule.FileName'.
- [CA1840: Use 'Environment.CurrentManagedThreadId'](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1840.md): 'Environment.CurrentManagedThreadId' is simpler and faster than 'Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId'.
